attributes.action: plant ten million more trees every three years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With tree cover in the UK being only a quarter of many European countries it is time to generate an emerald neckless of trees around our urban areas to create healthier, happier environments - to benefit people at work, rest and play.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "plant ten million more trees every three years."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20240


Prime Minister's Office
